Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the production process adheres to the planned schedule.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Production Orders / Total Production Orders) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of production capacity that is being used versus the total available capacity.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.FORMULA: (Actual Production Output / Maximum Possible Production Output) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of products delivered on or before the scheduled delivery date.
The average time taken to produce a product from start to finish.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.FORMULA: Total Time from Order to Delivery

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.EXPLANATION: The percentage of production time that is lost due to machine or process downtime.
Measures how closely actual production aligns with forecasts.
Measures the effectiveness of resource allocation in production processes.
The time required to switch from producing one product to another on the production line.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Production P.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Changeovers / Number of Changeovers
